greeting.value: Hello there, I would like to inform you of the bandit raid that happened last week.
I don't want to talk to you!
Hi %PLAYER%, how are you getting on with those bandits?
There we have our hero who killed all the bandits for us! What can we do for you?
Ah, you're back. Do you want to help us with our bandit problem yet?

bandit raid.value: Yes, it was awful, imagine the blood. Have you ever been raided?(Y/N)?

Y.value: You did? Then you must understand us. Do you want to help us?

N.value: Then you are one lucky %GENDER%! Do you want to help us?

bandit raid.value: That awful raid. Luckily you're here to help us!
Ah yes, you finished of those bandits nicely! Many thanks for that! You have our eternal gratitude
We've talked about this before. The raid was horrible. Can you give us some help?

help.value: We know where the bandits are hanging out. If you want to go there and wipe them out for us you would be rewarded! Can you help us? (Y/N)?

N.value: That's a shame. Do come back if you change your mind!

help.value: Do you want to help us? (Y/N)?

N.value: Why did you even bother me about it then?
